=======
History

0.1.0 (2021-10-20)
------------------

* First release on PyPI.

0.1.1 (some time ago)
---------------------

* Minor bug fixes

0.1.2. (2022-9-13)
------------------

* Support for N-channel 3D tensors

0.1.3. (2022-9-13)
------------------

* Cleanup and ready to redistribute


0.1.4. (2023-8-28)

* Bug fix / behavoir change
